sentences.en: Don't fritter away your money on things you do not really need.
sentences.cn: 不要把钱浪费在你并不真正需要的东西上.

sentences.en: Don't fritter away your precious time.
sentences.cn: 大好时光,不可等闲度过.

sentences.en: It's easy to fritter away a fortune if you're not careful.
sentences.cn: 如果你不小心,要挥霍掉一大笔钱是很容易的.

sentences.en: Popular fillings include beef, dough fritter, shrimp, and barbecued pork.
sentences.cn: 常用的填料包括牛肉, 油条, 虾, 和叉烧.

trans.tran_en: a thin piece of fruit, vegetable, or meat covered with a mixture of eggs and flour and cooked in hot fat
